Description: A Ninja is a master of many tools and weapons, from the deadly Ninja Blade to deadly Tashibish, in addition to various poisons.

Powers.DescLong: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more lethal damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Paralyzing Darts do minor toxic damage over time and incapacitate your foe.  Damage: Minor(DoT) Recharge: Fast

You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

You activate a kemuridama smoke bomb at your feet.  The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. A mixture of toxins in the smoke also weaken your foes, reducing how much damage they inflict in addition to lowering their chance to hit. Recharge: Very Long
